errors.title: API validation exception
errors.errorSummary: Api validation failed: {0}
errors.errorDescription: API validation failed for the current request. This is a fairly general error that signifies that endpoint's precondition has been violated. Such preconditions are endpoint specific. Users are encouraged to navigate to the documentation for the endpoint and read through the "Response Parameter" section. For example, the documentation for "Suspend User" indicates that suspending a user who is not active will result in the `E0000001` error code.
